description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9te17","text":"Protocol to extract histones from cells using direct acid extraction with the purpose of label-free LC-MS/MS measurement.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"apr4g","text":"DISCLAIMER – FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY; USE AT YOUR OWN RISK","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3rkbh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ov31","text":"The protocol content here is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal, medical, clinical, or safety advice, or otherwise; content added to protocols.io is not peer reviewed and may not have undergone a formal approval of any kind. Information presented in this protocol should not substitute for independent professional judgment, advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Any action you take or refrain from taking using or relying upon the information presented here is strictly at your own risk. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"664gp","text":"Protein lobind Eppendorf tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2r0jk","text":"Thermoshaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ce2pg","text":"Cooled centrifuge (4°C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mj5u","text":"Ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68vp3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4eif","text":"MilliQ water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2eu0","text":"12 M HCL (dilute to 0.4N HCl: for 300 mL: 10 mL 12M (37%) stock + 290 mL milliQ water)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebvfc","text":"TCA powder (make 100% TCA solution)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ettit","text":"Ice-cold acetone","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9rvs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"1a3q7","text":"Govaert E, Van Steendam K, Scheerlinck E, Vossaert L, Meert P, Stella M, Willems S, De Clerck L, Dhaenens M, Deforce D. Extracting histones for the specific purpose of label-free MS. Proteomics. 2016 Dec;16(23):2937-2944. doi: 10.1002/pmic.201600341. PMID: 27718312; PMCID: PMC5157773.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"936ck","text":"Resuspend the pellet in 0,4 N HCl by soft pipetting until no clumps are left in solution (125 µL for 1x106cells)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":90,"length":21},{"style":"sup","offset":105,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6a789","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4a95g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3psv3","text":"If necessary, vortex softly","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5vne","text":"Incubate 4h in acid on rotator 4°C to promote lysis of nuclei and solubilization of histones. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evnuc","text":" ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hmr0","text":"Transfer supernatant to new Eppendorfs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90m3l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ecptl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7ahnb","text":"Histones are present in the acid since they are alkaline proteins","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8g41g","text":"Add, drop by drop (very slowly and in the middle of the eppendorf), TCA (final concentration 33%: 61.25µl for 1x106) to promote precipitation of histones and invert the tube several times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":73,"length":43},{"style":"sup","offset":114,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"88ecs","text":"Spin for 10 min at 4°C, 16000g to pellet the histones.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7k5dp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1pjko","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"12n0c","text":"Important: Place all the eppendorfs in the same position =\u003e makes it easier to know where the pellet is localized","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2tvv0","text":"Remove the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0ip7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"13lq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fvpcq","text":"Be careful, the pellet is not always visible, smear on wall.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"729rk","text":"Add ±150 µL ice-cold acetone (don’t resuspend the pellet) to remove TCA. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edlvb","text":"Add ±150 µL cold acetone (don’t resuspend the pellet) to remove TCA. If not all the acid is removed it will destroy the SDS-gel. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ai09m","text":"Dry at room temperature for 30 minutes (until no acetone left). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8bt","text":"Transfer 20 µL (from 400.000 cells) to a new Eppendorf tube for gel. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Direct acid extraction

creator.name: Laura Corveleyn
creator.affiliation: ProGenTomics, Laboratory of Pharmaceutical Biotechnology, Ghent University, Ghent, Belgium
